definition: three-legged Golden Crow that lives in the sun (in northeast Asian and Chinese mythology)/Korean: samjog'o
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
three-legged Golden Crow that lives in the sun (in northeast Asian and Chinese mythology)/Korean: samjog'o
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
Bai Ze or White Marsh, legendary creature of ancient China
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
